EarnApp

Turn your unused internet bandwidth into passive income. EarnApp is a legitimate way to monetize your internet connection.

Sign Up Now How to Set Up

About EarnApp

App Details

Category: Bandwidth Sharing
Monthly Earnings: $10-25
Payment Methods: PayPal, Amazon Gift Cards
Minimum Payout: $2.50
Platforms: Windows, macOS, Android
Setup Difficulty: Easy
Resource Usage: Low
Referral Program: $0.50 per device + 10% of referral earnings

Pros & Cons

Pros:

  • Very low minimum payout threshold ($2.50)
  • Fast payments (usually within 24 hours)
  • Excellent referral program
  • Backed by established company (Bright Data)
  • Simple and clean user interface
  • Minimal impact on internet speed
  • Transparent earnings dashboard

Cons:

  • Not available in all countries
  • Limited payment options compared to competitors
  • No iOS app available yet
  • Earnings can vary significantly by location
  • Requires Google account for sign-up

How EarnApp Works

EarnApp works by allowing you to share your unused internet bandwidth with Bright Data's network. This bandwidth is then used for various legitimate business purposes such as:

  • Web intelligence gathering for businesses
  • Price comparison and monitoring
  • Ad verification and brand protection
  • Market research and competitive analysis

The app runs in the background on your devices and only uses bandwidth that you're not actively using. You earn credits based on the amount of data shared, which can then be converted to cash once you reach the minimum payout threshold of just $2.50.

How to Set Up EarnApp

1

Create an account

Visit the EarnApp website and sign up with your Google account.

2

Download the app

Download and install the EarnApp application on your preferred device(s).

3

Link your devices

Open the app and link it to your account by entering the device ID shown in your dashboard.

4

Cash out

Once you reach the minimum payout threshold of $2.50, you can cash out via PayPal or Amazon Gift Cards.

Sign Up for EarnApp

Earnings Calculator

earnapp-earnings-calculator.js 
          
            <span class="line-number">1</span>// EarnApp Earnings Calculator
<span class="line-number">2</span>const calculateEarnAppEarnings = (devices, hours, referrals, referralDevices) => {
<span class="line-number">3</span>  // Base earnings: varies by location, average $0.10-0.25 per GB
<span class="line-number">4</span>  // Average bandwidth usage: 10-15 MB per hour per device
<span class="line-number">5</span>  const avgMbPerHour = 12; // 12 MB per hour average
<span class="line-number">6</span>  const avgRatePerGb = 0.15; // $0.15 per GB average
<span class="line-number">7</span>
<span class="line-number">8</span>  // Calculate daily bandwidth earnings
<span class="line-number">9</span>  const dailyMb = devices * hours * avgMbPerHour;
<span class="line-number">10</span>  const dailyGb = dailyMb / 1024;
<span class="line-number">11</span>  const dailyBandwidthEarnings = dailyGb * avgRatePerGb;
<span class="line-number">12</span>
<span class="line-number">13</span>  // Referral earnings
<span class="line-number">14</span>  // $0.50 one-time bonus per device + 10% of earnings
<span class="line-number">15</span>  const oneTimeBonus = referralDevices * 0.5 / 30; // Spread across a month
<span class="line-number">16</span>  const avgReferralDailyEarning = 0.08; // $0.08 per day per referral device average
<span class="line-number">17</span>  const referralEarnings = referralDevices * avgReferralDailyEarning * 0.1;
<span class="line-number">18</span>  const totalReferralEarnings = oneTimeBonus + referralEarnings;
<span class="line-number">19</span>
<span class="line-number">20</span>  // Calculate total daily earnings
<span class="line-number">21</span>  const totalDailyEarnings = dailyBandwidthEarnings + totalReferralEarnings;
<span class="line-number">22</span>
<span class="line-number">23</span>  // Calculate monthly earnings
<span class="line-number">24</span>  const monthlyEarnings = totalDailyEarnings * 30;
<span class="line-number">25</span>
<span class="line-number">26</span>  return {
<span class="line-number">27</span>    dailyBandwidthEarnings: dailyBandwidthEarnings.toFixed(2),
<span class="line-number">28</span>    dailyReferralEarnings: totalReferralEarnings.toFixed(2),
<span class="line-number">29</span>    totalDailyEarnings: totalDailyEarnings.toFixed(2),
<span class="line-number">30</span>    monthlyEarnings: monthlyEarnings.toFixed(2),
<span class="line-number">31</span>    daysToMinPayout: Math.ceil(2.5 / totalDailyEarnings)
<span class="line-number">32</span>  };
<span class="line-number">33</span>};
<span class="line-number">34</span>
<span class="line-number">35</span>// Example calculation for 2 devices running 12 hours with 3 referrals having 6 devices
<span class="line-number">36</span>const earnings = calculateEarnAppEarnings(2, 12, 3, 6);
<span class="line-number">37</span>console.log(`Monthly earnings: $${earnings.monthlyEarnings}`);
<span class="line-number">38</span>console.log(`Days to reach minimum payout: ${earnings.daysToMinPayout}`);

Frequently Asked Questions

What is EarnApp and how does it work?

EarnApp is a passive income application that pays you for sharing your unused internet bandwidth. The bandwidth is used by Bright Data (the parent company) for web intelligence, price comparison, ad verification, and other legitimate business purposes.

Is EarnApp safe and legitimate?

Yes, EarnApp is developed by Bright Data (formerly Luminati Networks), a well-established company in the web data collection industry. The app doesn't access your personal data or browsing history, and only uses your excess bandwidth.

How much can I earn with EarnApp?

Earnings vary based on your location, internet speed, and how many devices you use. On average, users earn between $10-25 per month with 2-3 devices running continuously. Users in the US, UK, and other high-demand countries tend to earn more.

Will EarnApp slow down my internet?

EarnApp is designed to use only your excess bandwidth, so most users don't notice any significant slowdown. The app includes settings to limit bandwidth usage if needed.

How do I get paid from EarnApp?

Once you reach the minimum payout threshold of $2.50, you can withdraw your earnings via PayPal or Amazon Gift Cards. Payments are typically processed within 24-48 hours.

Start Earning with EarnApp Today

Join thousands of users who are already earning passive income by sharing their unused internet bandwidth.
